effect.shortEffect: Increases Attack to 1.5× with a major status ailment.
effect.full: Whenever this Pokémon is asleep, burned, paralyzed, or poisoned, it has 1.5× its Attack. This Pokémon is not affected by the usual Attack cut from a burn. This bonus does not count as a stat modifier.

description.diamond-pearl: Boosts Attack if there is a status problem.
description.platinum: Boosts Attack if there is a status problem.
description.heartgold-soulsilver: Boosts Attack if there is a status problem.
description.black-white: Boosts Attack if there is a status problem.
description.black-2-white-2: Boosts Attack if there is a status problem.
description.x-y: Boosts the Attack stat if the Pokémon has a status condition.
description.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire: Boosts the Attack stat if the Pokémon has a status condition.
description.sun-moon: It’s so gutsy that having a status condition boosts the Pokémon’s Attack stat.
